message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. I think this is a fair price considering the value it brings to the table. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and compromise on the price. What do you think?

Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm not ready to let go of the product just yet. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need a bit more. I'm thinking of a price of $11500. What do you think?

Hi Alice, I understand you're not willing to go as low as I was hoping, but I'm still interested in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'm thinking of a price of $11000. Can you consider this?

Hi Bob, I understand you're getting close to your target price, but I'm still not willing to let go of the product without getting a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need a bit more. I'm thinking of a price of $11750. What do you think?
